attributes.action: Take measures to ensure the returning dead from combat areas are escorted from landing to coroners
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Following the revelation that our heroic dead are left at the borders of Thames police area to fend for themselves in traffic compared to the manner in which the Canadian dead have been shown to be escorted and saluted along the route, It is behoven on us to request that the prime minister's office make such arrangements that this state of affairs be more equitably dealt with in this country. Whether this be by Military police or Thames police there must be a way in which this may be actioned.

I have asked for 2 month duration as this is important to be moved forward.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
